name: Shure SM7B Cardioid Dynamic Microphone
description: The Shure SM7B is a cardioid dynamic microphone that is designed for use in a variety of settings, including live performances, podcasting, and home recording. It features a smooth, flat, wide-range frequency response and a built-in pop filter and shock mount for reduced noise and handling noise.

name: AmazonBasics Desktop Mini Condenser Microphone
description: The AmazonBasics Desktop Mini Condenser Microphone is a compact and affordable option for recording vocals, instruments, and more. It features a cardioid polar pattern for improved sound isolation and a built-in stand for easy placement. Compatible with most devices with a 3.5mm jack.

name: KOORUI Business Computer Monitor Display
description: The KOORUI Business Computer Monitor Display is a 27-inch LED monitor that features a 1080P resolution and a wide viewing angle. It has a sleek and slim design with a thickness of only 7mm and a frameless design. The monitor supports VESA mount and it is compatible with most computer systems.

name: Beats Solo3 Wireless On-Ear Headphones
description: The Beats Solo3 Wireless On-Ear Headphones are a premium set of headphones that feature Bluetooth connectivity, up to 40 hours of battery life, and on-ear controls for adjusting volume and switching tracks. They have a sleek, stylish design and come in a variety of colors. They also have a built-in microphone for taking calls and use the Apple W1 chip for easy and stable connectivity with Apple devices.
